## ciliumctl bpf auth

Manage authenticated connections between identities

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for auth
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```

### SEE ALSO

* [ciliumctl bpf](ciliumctl_bpf.md)	 - Direct access to local BPF maps
* [ciliumctl bpf auth flush](ciliumctl_bpf_auth_flush.md)	 - Deletes all entries for authenticated connections between identities
* [ciliumctl bpf auth list](ciliumctl_bpf_auth_list.md)	 - List all authenticated connections between identities
